title: When can i buy ssw skins?
body: Guys does some 1 know when the ssw skins are comming and are they comming i want to buy ssw rengar?

replies.body: I believe after every worlds championship previous world's champions skins are available. Previous championships skins as well (besides championship Riven) are also made available for purchase
I am annoying but do you know when the world championship is going to be?
world championship starts on the 29th of September. And it seem like you can get championship riven this time

I don't have any information on upcoming sales or new content, unfortunately.  Anything on the way will be announced at our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page.  Bookmark that and hang tight!
